aeneas.models

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • aeneas.models.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LightningBoard, PuzzleBoard, ReleaseBoard

    public abstract class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a board for a KabaSuji level A board keeps track of its pieces, hints, and the shape of the board.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:

        Gets the state of all squares in the board. A square will be null if no square is there

        Set whether or not the board is in an editor context. This affects whether or not hints and release numbers can be dragged around.
